item.title: Writing a Regular Expression Tester in Crystal as a Learning Exercise
item.description: App screenshot TL;DR for those in a rush # I did this: http://www.crystular.org/. This article was originally published here. Because I wanted to write something useful and contribute to the community, I was looking for a small idea in the Ruby world and spoiler alert… I found it.
